spec_data.Name: texlive-eso-pic
spec_data.Description:
The package adds one or more user commands to LaTeX's shipout
routine, which may be used to place the output at fixed
positions. The grid option may be used to find the correct
places.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 06 Aug 2017 08:30:16 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Add picture commands (or backgrounds) to every page
